item.title: SQL 11. Views & Data Manipulation
item.description:
If you’re prepping for a SQL or data engineering interview, itâ€™s essential to be fluent not only in writing queries but also in understanding the impact of commands like UPDATE, DELETE, and views (both virtual and materialized). This post covers practical examples and deepens your understanding of data manipulation and view management in PostgreSQL.

1. UPDATE: Modifying Existing Rows

To modify data in a table, use the UPDATE statement. Here’s the general syntax:
